docs.title: MeshCreator
docs.text:
MeshCreator is a plugin that allows you to create new meshes or modify meshes created in other programs using Editable Mesh, which is in beta testing on Roblox.

Tutorials

Download

docs.title: Precautions before use
docs.text:
• Please turn on EditableImage and EditableMesh in the beta features.
  • Before launching Roblox Studio, please make sure you have enough memory.
  • Do not quit Roblox Studio with this plugin enabled.

Links

  • DevForum

  • Github

docs.title: Getting started
docs.text: With the plugin turned on in Roblox Studio, click any mesh part. Edit the mesh as you wish. Then, you can click the Mesh Creator plugin button again to finish editing.

docs.title: Elements
docs.text: Anything editable using MeshCreator is called an Element.

docs.title: Vertex
docs.text:
Vertex can be edited with VertexAttachment created on the selected MeshPart.

To adjust the size of the vertex, enable Constraint Details in the Model tab of Roblox Studio and enter the desired size below.

You can change the shape of the meshpart by moving attachments added to the meshpart.

You can remove that vertex by deleting the attachment.

docs.title: Edge
docs.text:
You can edit the edge by changing Select mode to Edge.

When you select an edge, the vertices included in that edge are also selected. You can only choose one Edge.

You can move edge with Roblox Studio's move tool.

When you remove an edge, the vertices included in that edge are also removed.

docs.title: Triangle
docs.text:
You can edit the triangle by changing Select mode to Triangle. You can select multiple triangles by holding down Shift.

When you select a triangle, the vertices included in that triangle are also selected. You can move triangle with Roblox Studio's move tool.

When you remove an triangle, the vertices included in that triangle are also removed.

docs.title: Select mode
docs.text: You can change the select mode to determine selectable elements.

docs.title: Extrude Region Tool
docs.text: You can select a triangle and drag the arrow to extrude the triangle.
